attributes.action: REPATRIAT OUR FALLEN HEROS FROM MUSLIM COUNTRIES
attributes.additional_details:
From the video published here it can be clearly seen that we cannot trust Islamic countries with our war dead.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBbB9k7kYc4

www.youtube.cohttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBbB9k7kYc4m/watch?v=wv4tGUcU1lI

Here is the true face of the people NATO helped, desecrating and destroying head stones in the commonwealth war cemetery in Benghazi Libya They show there true colours by also attacking our faiths symbol, The Cross of Sacrifice.

We the undersigned demand that the British government repatriates all our known war dead home from all Islamic countries to the National Arboretum as they have demonstrated by their actions that we cannot trust them with our dead.
